protonmail.name: ProtonMail
pros: Includes a VPN account, calendar, and cloud storage with all plans
cons: No desktop app, web or third-party email client only.

skiff.name: Skiff
pros: Apps available for Android, iOS, and Mac
Includes a collaborative workspace, calendar, and cloud storage with all plans
cons: No desktop app for Windows or Linux, or third-party email client, web only
Audited, but results have not been publicly released yet

tutanota.name: Tutanota
pros: Includes a calendar with all plans
